Overview.content: OpenCms allows you to nest containers. You can use the <cms:container> tag in formatter JSPs. Then content elements placed on your webpage add new containers. Here is what you should know when using nested containers.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Learn why and how to use nested containers.

Link.LinkText: See an example where the page layout is designed via nested containers.
